channel.title: James Fenn - JavaScript
channel.description: Writer of bad puns and slightly better software. This website contains information about my adventures in programming, current projects, and me.

item.title: Client-Side JavaScript
item.description: Why I rewrote my site with Jekyll, rather than running a ton of client-side JavaScript that doesn't really work all of the time.

item.title: JavaScript: Productivity over Proof
item.description: In the vast majority everyday software, nobody writes a mathematical proof of every piece of functionality. Dynamically typed languages exist for a reason, and this is not it.
